summary: Defines a PyTorch-compatible graph neural network layer that implements the Topology Adaptive Graph Convolutional Network (TAGCN) using DGL's TAGConv, transforming node features through learned convolutional filters over graph structures.
business_intent: Provides a ready-to-use TAGCN layer for building graph-based deep learning models, facilitating research and development of applications such as node classification, link prediction, and graph representation learning.
